trans-unit.source: Mocking the HeroService with a spy is a familiar story. But the Router has a complicated API and is entwined with other services and application preconditions. Might it be difficult to mock?
trans-unit.target: 嘲讽 HeroService 与间谍是一个熟悉的故事。但是 Router 具有复杂的API，并且与其他服务和应用程序先决条件交织在一起。可能很难嘲笑吗？

trans-unit.source: Modern HTML5 browsers support history.pushState, a technique that changes a browser's location and history without triggering a server page request. The router can compose a "natural" URL that is indistinguishable from one that would otherwise require a page load.
trans-unit.target: 现代HTML5浏览器支持history.pushState，该技术可更改浏览器的位置和历史记录而无需触发服务器页面请求。路由器可以组成一个“自然” URL，该URL与否则需要页面加载的URL不能区分。

trans-unit.source: Modern HTML5 browsers were the first to support pushState which is why many people refer to these URLs as "HTML5 style" URLs.
trans-unit.target: 现代HTML5浏览器最先支持 pushState ，这就是为什么许多人将这些URL称为“ HTML5样式” URL的原因。

trans-unit.source: Modifies how Angular-specific annotations are emitted to improve tree-shaking. Non-Angular annotations are not affected. One of static fields (the default) or decorators.
trans-unit.target: 修改特定于Angular的注释的发出方式，以改善树的抖动。非角度注释不受影响。一个 static fields （默认值）或 decorators 。

trans-unit.source: Modules are a great way to organize an application and extend it with capabilities from external libraries.
trans-unit.target: 模块是组织应用程序并利用外部库的功能进行扩展的好方法。

trans-unit.source: Modules can also add services to the application. Such services might be internally developed, like something you'd develop yourself or come from outside sources, such as the Angular router and HTTP client.
trans-unit.target: 模块还可以为应用添加服务。这些服务可能是内部开发的,比如你自己开发的东西,也可能来自外部,比如Angular路由器和HTTP客户端。

trans-unit.source: Modules can be loaded eagerly when the application starts or lazy loaded asynchronously by the router.
trans-unit.target: 模块可以在应用程序启动时急切加载,也可以由路由器异步加载。

trans-unit.target: 通常，括号之间的文本是Angular首先求值然后转换为string的模板表达式。以下插值通过将两个数字相加来说明该点：

trans-unit.source: More information
trans-unit.target: 更多信息

trans-unit.source: More often, you don't know when the data has changed, especially in applications that mutate data in many ways, perhaps in application locations far away. A component in such an application usually can't know about those changes. Moreover, it's unwise to distort the component design to accommodate a pipe. Strive to keep the component class independent of the HTML. The component should be unaware of pipes.
trans-unit.target: 更多的时候,你不知道数据什么时候发生了变化,特别是在那些以多种方式突变数据的应用程序中,也许在很远的应用程序位置。这样的应用程序中的组件通常无法知道这些变化。此外,为了适应管道而扭曲组件设计是不明智的。力求使组件类独立于HTML。组件应该不知道管道的存在。

trans-unit.source: More precisely, the redisplay occurs after some kind of asynchronous event related to the view, such as a keystroke, a timer completion, or a response to an HTTP request.
trans-unit.target: 更准确地说,重新显示发生在与视图相关的某种异步事件之后,如按键、定时器完成或对HTTP请求的响应。

trans-unit.source: More rarely, an interceptor may handle the request entirely, and compose a new event stream instead of invoking next.handle(). This is an acceptable behavior, but keep in mind that further interceptors will be skipped entirely.
trans-unit.target: 很少有拦截器可以完全处理请求，并 next.handle() 新的事件流，而不是调用next.handle（）。这是可以接受的行为，但请记住，其他拦截器将被完全跳过。

trans-unit.source: Most .js files are git-ignored. If you want to include an ignored code file in your project and display it in a guide you must un-ignore it.
trans-unit.target: 大多数 .js 文件都是git忽略的。如果要在项目中包含忽略的代码文件并在指南中显示它，则必须将其忽略。

trans-unit.source: Most Visual Studio developers like to press the F5 key and see the IIS server come up. To use the IIS server with the Getting Started app, you must make the following three changes.
trans-unit.target: 大多数Visual Studio开发人员喜欢按F5键,然后看到IIS服务器出现。要使用IIS服务器与 "入门 "应用程序,你必须进行以下三项更改。

trans-unit.source: Most application developers won't need to add components to the entryComponents.
trans-unit.target: 大多数应用程序开发人员无需将组件添加到 entryComponents 。

trans-unit.source: Most apps are translated into more than one other language. For this reason, it is standard practice for the project structure to reflect the entire internationalization effort.
trans-unit.target: 大多数应用程序都被翻译成一种以上的其他语言。因此,项目结构反映整个国际化工作是标准做法。

trans-unit.source: Most apps strive for a consistent look across the application. The CLI generated an empty styles.css for this purpose. Put your application-wide styles there.
trans-unit.target: 大多数应用程序都力求在整个应用程序中保持一致的外观。CLI 为此生成了一个空的 styles.css 。将您整个应用程序的样式放在那里。

trans-unit.source: Most commands, and some options, have aliases. Aliases are shown in the syntax statement for each command.
trans-unit.target: 大多数命令和一些选项都有别名。每个命令的别名都在语法语句中显示。

trans-unit.source: Most components are not quite this simple, of course. Many of them have inputs and outputs that connect them to the outside world. An Angular hero detail component with inputs and outputs might look like this:
trans-unit.target: 当然，大多数组件都不是那么简单。他们中的许多人都有输入和输出，可以将它们连接到外部世界。具有输入和输出的Angular英雄细节组件可能如下所示：

trans-unit.source: Most developers should always implement a Routing Module for the sake of consistency. It keeps the code clean when configuration becomes complex. It makes testing the feature module easier. Its existence calls attention to the fact that a module is routed. It is where developers expect to find and expand routing configuration.
trans-unit.target: 大多数开发人员为了一致性,总是应该实现一个路由模块。当配置变得复杂时,它可以保持代码的干净。它使功能模块的测试变得更容易。它的存在使人们注意到一个模块是路由的事实。它是开发人员期望找到和扩展路由配置的地方。

trans-unit.source: Most front-end applications communicate with backend services over the HTTP protocol. Modern browsers support two different APIs for making HTTP requests: the XMLHttpRequest interface and the fetch() API.
trans-unit.target: 大多数前端应用程序通过HTTP协议与后端服务进行通信。现代浏览器支持两种不同的API来发出HTTP请求： XMLHttpRequest 接口和 fetch() API。

trans-unit.source: Most interceptors call next.handle() so that the request flows through to the next interceptor and, eventually, the backend handler. An interceptor could skip calling next.handle(), short-circuit the chain, and return its own Observable with an artificial server response.
trans-unit.target: 大多数拦截器都调用 next.handle() ,以便请求流向下一个拦截器，并最终到达后端处理程序。拦截器可以跳过调用 next.handle() ，缩短链，并使用人工服务器响应返回其自己的 Observable 。

trans-unit.source: Most interceptors inspect the request on the way in and forward the (perhaps altered) request to the handle() method of the next object which implements the HttpHandler interface.
trans-unit.target: 大多数拦截器会在途中检查请求，然后将（可能已更改的）请求转发到实现 HttpHandler 接口的 next 对象的 handle() 方法。

trans-unit.source: Most interceptors transform the outgoing request before passing it to the next interceptor in the chain, by calling next.handle(transformedReq). An interceptor may transform the response event stream as well, by applying additional RxJS operators on the stream returned by next.handle().
trans-unit.target: 大多数拦截器通过调用 next.handle(transformedReq) 在将传出请求传递到链中的下一个拦截器之前先对其进行转换。通过在 next.handle() 返回的流上应用其他RxJS运算符，拦截器也可以转换响应事件流。

trans-unit.source: Most of the ad banner implementation is in ad-banner.component.ts. To keep things simple in this example, the HTML is in the @Component decorator's template property as a template string.
trans-unit.target: 大多数广告横幅实现都在 ad-banner.component.ts 中。为了使本示例中的内容保持简单，HTML位于 @Component 装饰器的 template 属性中，作为模板字符串。

trans-unit.source: Most of these initial checks are triggered by Angular's first rendering of unrelated data elsewhere on the page. Mere mousing into another <input> triggers a call. Relatively few calls reveal actual changes to pertinent data. Clearly our implementation must be very lightweight or the user experience suffers.
trans-unit.target: 这些初始检查大多数是由Angular 在页面其他位置首次呈现无关数据触发的。仅仅将鼠标悬停在另一个 <input> 中就会触发一个呼叫。相对而言，很少有电话能揭示相关数据的实际变化。显然，我们的实现必须非常轻巧，否则用户体验会受到影响。

trans-unit.source: Most pages display a table of contents (TOC). The TOC appears in the right panel when the viewport is wide. When narrow, the TOC appears in an expandable/collapsible region near the top of the page.
trans-unit.target: 大多数页面都会显示目录(TOC)。当视口较宽时,TOC会出现在右侧面板中。当视口较窄时,TOC出现在页面顶部附近的可展开/可折叠区域。

trans-unit.source: Most people find this browser output easier to read than the console log. You can click on a test row to re-run just that test or click on a description to re-run the tests in the selected test group ("test suite").
trans-unit.target: 大多数人发现这个浏览器输出比控制台日志更容易阅读。你可以点击一个测试行来重新运行该测试,或者点击一个描述来重新运行所选测试组的测试("测试套件")。

trans-unit.source: Most routing applications should add a <base> element to the index.html as the first child in the <head> tag to tell the router how to compose navigation URLs.
trans-unit.target: 大多数路由应用程序应在 <head> 标记中的第一个子元素中向 <base> index.html >添加<base>元素，以告诉路由器如何组成导航URL。

trans-unit.source: Most test suites in this guide call beforeEach() to set the preconditions for each it() test and rely on the TestBed to create classes and inject services.
trans-unit.target: 本指南中的大多数测试套件都调用 beforeEach() 来设置每个 it() 测试的前提条件，并依靠 TestBed 创建类和注入服务。

trans-unit.source: Most updates to the Angular service worker are transparent to the app—the old caches are still valid and content is still served normally. However, occasionally a bugfix or feature in the Angular service worker requires the invalidation of old caches. In this case, the app will be refreshed transparently from the network.
trans-unit.target: Angular Service Worker的大多数更新对应用程序都是透明的-旧的缓存仍然有效，内容仍可正常提供。但是，有时Angular服务工作程序中的错误修正或功能要求使旧缓存无效。在这种情况下，该应用将从网络透明地刷新。

trans-unit.source: Most web APIs support a get by id request in the form :baseURL/:id.
trans-unit.target: 大多数Web API支持以 :baseURL/:id 的形式进行id by get请求。

trans-unit.source: Motion greatly enhances the user experience, so animations give users a chance to detect the application's response to their actions.
trans-unit.target: 运动极大地增强了用户体验,因此动画给用户提供了一个检测应用程序对其行动的反应的机会。

trans-unit.source: Next, convert your current JavaScript files into TypeScript. Since TypeScript is a super-set of ECMAScript 2015, which in turn is a super-set of ECMAScript 5, you can simply switch the file extensions from .js to .ts and everything will work just like it did before. As the TypeScript compiler runs, it emits the corresponding .js file for every .ts file and the compiled JavaScript is what actually gets executed. If you start the project HTTP server with npm start, you should see the fully functional application in your browser.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，将当前的JavaScript文件转换为TypeScript。由于TypeScript是ECMAScript 2015的超集，而ECMAScript 2015是ECMAScript 5的超集，因此您只需将文件扩展名从 .js 切换到 .ts ，一切将像以前一样工作。当TypeScript编译器运行时，它将为每个 .ts 文件发出一个相应的 .js 文件，并且编译后的JavaScript才是实际执行的代码。如果使用 npm start 启动项目HTTP服务器，则应该在浏览器中看到功能完整的应用程序。

trans-unit.source: Next, to provide better user experience, we show an appropriate error message when the form is invalid.

trans-unit.source: Next, update the app.module.ts file, removing RouterModule.forRoot in the imports array.

trans-unit.source: Next, update the template. At the moment it displays the hero's id and name. Fix that to display only the hero's name property.

trans-unit.source: Next, we have to add the directive to the html template. Since the validator must be registered at the highest level in the form, we put the directive on the form tag.

trans-unit.source: Next, you'll add a checkout form at the bottom of the "Cart" page.
trans-unit.target: 接下来,你将在 "购物车 "页面的底部添加一个结账表单。

trans-unit.source: Next, you'll bootstrap the application as a hybrid application that supports both AngularJS and Angular components. After that, you can start converting the individual pieces to Angular.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，您将引导该应用程序为同时支持AngularJS和Angular组件的混合应用程序。之后，您可以开始将单个零件转换为Angular。

trans-unit.source: Next, you'll update the HeroesModule metadata.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，您将更新 HeroesModule 元数据。

trans-unit.source: Next, you're targeting the viewContainerRef that exists on this specific instance of the component. How do you know it's this specific instance? Because it's referring to adHost and adHost is the directive you set up earlier to tell Angular where to insert dynamic components.
trans-unit.target: 接下来，您将定位在该组件的特定实例上存在的 viewContainerRef 。您怎么知道这是特定实例？因为它是指 adHost ， adHost 是您之前设置的指令，用于告诉Angular在哪里插入动态组件。

trans-unit.source: NgModules and JavaScript modules

trans-unit.source: NgModules and components
trans-unit.target: Ng模块和组件

trans-unit.source: NgModules are a great way to selectively aggregate classes from other NgModules and re-export them in a consolidated, convenience module.
trans-unit.target: NgModules是一种很好的方式,可以有选择地聚合其他NgModules中的类,并将它们重新导出到一个综合的、方便的模块中。

trans-unit.source: NgModules are classes decorated with @NgModule. The @NgModule decorator’s imports array tells Angular what other NgModules the current module needs. The modules in the imports array are different than JavaScript modules because they are NgModules rather than regular JavaScript modules. Classes with an @NgModule decorator are by convention kept in their own files, but what makes them an NgModule isn’t being in their own file, like JavaScript modules; it’s the presence of @NgModule and its metadata.
trans-unit.target: NgModules是用 @NgModule 装饰的类。该 @NgModule 装饰的 imports 阵列告诉角还有什么其他NgModules当前模块的需求。中模块 imports ，因为他们NgModules，而不是常规的JavaScript模块阵列是不是JavaScript的模块不同。按照惯例，带有 @NgModule 装饰器的类保存在自己的文件中，但是使它们成为 NgModule 的原因却不在JavaScript文件之类的自己的文件中；它是 @NgModule 及其元数据的存在。

trans-unit.source: NgModules are typically named after the file in which the exported thing is defined. For example, the Angular DatePipe class belongs to a feature module named date_pipe in the file date_pipe.ts. You import them from an Angular scoped package such as @angular/core.
trans-unit.target: NgModule通常以定义了导出内容的文件命名。例如，Angular DatePipe类属于文件 date_pipe.ts 中名为 date_pipe 的要素模块。您可以从Angular 作用域的包（例如 @angular/core 导入它们。

trans-unit.source: NgModules consolidate components, directives, and pipes into cohesive blocks of functionality, each focused on a feature area, application business domain, workflow, or common collection of utilities.
trans-unit.target: NgModules将组件、指令和管道整合成具有凝聚力的功能块,每个功能块都集中在一个功能领域、应用业务领域、工作流或公用工具集合上。

trans-unit.source: NgModules help organize an application into cohesive blocks of functionality.
trans-unit.target: NgModules有助于将一个应用程序组织成有凝聚力的功能块。

trans-unit.source: NgModules or components that are loaded on launch are called eager-loaded, to distinguish them from those that are loaded at run time (lazy-loaded). See lazy loading.
trans-unit.target: 在启动时加载的NgModule或组件称为eager-loaded，以将它们与在运行时加载的组件或组件（延迟加载）区分开。请参阅延迟加载。

trans-unit.source: NgModules provide a compilation context for their components. A root NgModule always has a root component that is created during bootstrap, but any NgModule can include any number of additional components, which can be loaded through the router or created through the template. The components that belong to an NgModule share a compilation context.
trans-unit.target: NgModules 为其组件提供了编译上下文。根NgModule始终具有在引导过程中创建的根组件，但是任何NgModule都可以包括任意数量的其他组件，这些组件可以通过路由器加载或通过模板创建。属于NgModule的组件共享一个编译上下文。

trans-unit.source: NgModules, defined with the NgModule decorator, serve the same purpose:
trans-unit.target: 用 NgModule 装饰器定义的NgModules具有相同的目的：

trans-unit.source: Normally the starting point for search is at the point of injection. However, in this case <app-root>@Components are special in that they also include their own viewProviders, which is why the search starts at <#VIEW> belonging to <app-root>. (This would not be the case for a directive matched at the same location).
trans-unit.target: 通常，搜索的起点是在注射点。但是，在这种情况下， <app-root> @Component 的特殊之处在于它们还包含自己的 viewProviders ，这就是为什么搜索从属于 <app-root> 的 <#VIEW> 开始的原因。（对于在同一位置匹配的指令，情况并非如此）。

trans-unit.target: 关于业绩的说明

trans-unit.source: Note that AppModule declares both application components, AppComponent and HeroesComponent.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， AppModule 声明了两个应用程序组件 AppComponent 和 HeroesComponent 。

trans-unit.source: Note that a next() function could receive, for instance, message strings, or event objects, numeric values, or structures, depending on context. As a general term, we refer to data published by an observable as a stream. Any type of value can be represented with an observable, and the values are published as a stream.
trans-unit.target: 请注意， next() 函数可能会根据上下文接收例如消息字符串或事件对象，数值或结构。一般而言，我们将可观察对象发布的数据称为流。任何类型的值都可以用observable表示，并且这些值将作为流发布。

trans-unit.source: Note that a style property name can be written in either dash-case, as shown above, or camelCase, such as fontSize.

trans-unit.source: Note that an empty path route inherits its parent's parameters and data.

trans-unit.source: Note that just as a form group contains a group of controls, the profile formFormGroup is bound to the form element with the FormGroup directive, creating a communication layer between the model and the form containing the inputs. The formControlName input provided by the FormControlName directive binds each individual input to the form control defined in FormGroup. The form controls communicate with their respective elements. They also communicate changes to the form group instance, which provides the source of truth for the model value.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，就像表单组包含一组控件一样，概要文件表单 FormGroup 也通过 FormGroup 指令绑定到 form 元素，从而在模型和包含输入的表单之间创建了一个通信层。 FormControlName 指令提供的 formControlName 输入将每个单独的输入绑定到 FormGroup 中定义的表单控件。表单控件与它们各自的元素进行通信。他们还将更改传达给表单组实例，这为模型值提供了真实来源。

trans-unit.source: Note, adding try-finally block around the work to ensure that wtfLeave gets called can negatively impact the performance of your application. For this reason we recommend that you don't add them to ensure that wtfLeave gets called. In production wtfLeave is a noop and so try-finally block has no value. When debugging perf issues, skipping wtfLeave, do to exception, will produce incorrect trace, but presence of exception signifies logic error which needs to be fixed before the app should be profiled. Add try-finally only when you expect that an exception is expected during normal execution while profiling.
trans-unit.target: 注意，在工作周围添加try-finally块以确保调用 wtfLeave 会对应用程序的性能产生负面影响。因此，我们建议您不要添加它们以确保调用 wtfLeave 。在生产中 wtfLeave 是noop，因此try-finally块没有任何价值。在调试性能问题时，跳过 wtfLeave ，执行异常操作将产生不正确的跟踪，但是异常的存在表示逻辑错误，需要在对应用程序进行配置之前对其进行修复。仅当您希望在概要分析期间的正常执行期间预期会出现异常时，才添加try-finally。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the name and alterEgo are sibling controls. To evaluate both controls in a single custom validator, we should perform the validation in a common ancestor control: the FormGroup. That way, we can query the FormGroup for the child controls which will allow us to compare their values.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，名称和alterEgo是同级控件。为了在单个自定义验证器中评估两个控件，我们应该在一个共同的祖先控件 FormGroup 中执行验证。这样，我们可以在 FormGroup 中查询子控件，这将使我们能够比较它们的值。

trans-unit.source: Notice that the new service imports the Angular Injectable symbol and annotates the class with the @Injectable() decorator. This marks the class as one that participates in the dependency injection system. The HeroService class is going to provide an injectable service, and it can also have its own injected dependencies. trans-unit.target: 请注意，新服务将导入Angular Injectable 符号，并使用 @Injectable() 装饰器对类进行注释。这将类标记为参与依赖项注入系统的类。该 HeroService 类是要提供一种可注射的服务，而且还可以有自己的注入依赖。它尚无任何依赖关系，但很快就会实现。

trans-unit.source: Notice that this example captures the subscription and unsubscribe() when the AstronautComponent is destroyed. This is a memory-leak guard step. trans-unit.target: 注意，此示例在销毁 AstronautComponent 时捕获了 subscription 和 unsubscribe() 。这是内存泄漏保护措施。此应用程序没有实际风险，因为 AstronautComponent 的生存期与应用程序本身的生存期相同。这不会在一个更复杂的应用程序始终是正确的。

trans-unit.source: Notice that:

trans-unit.source: Notice the @Input decorator. It adds metadata to the class that makes the directive's highlightColor property available for binding.
trans-unit.target: 注意 @Input 装饰器。它将元数据添加到类中，从而使指令的 highlightColor 属性可用于绑定。

trans-unit.source: Notice the @Component() decorator. This indicates that the following class is a component. It provides metadata about the component, including its selector, templates, and styles.
trans-unit.target: 注意 @Component() 装饰器。这表明以下类别是一个组件。它提供有关组件的元数据，包括其选择器，模板和样式。

trans-unit.target: 注意其他语法差异： ngFor 之前的（*）是必需的；该 let 关键字标识 movie 作为输入变量; 名单介词 of ，而不是 in 。

trans-unit.target: 请注意，此组件可以在模型中显示任何类型的问题。此时，您只有两种类型的问题，但您可以想象更多。所述 ngSwitch 确定要显示类型的问题。

trans-unit.source: Notice, we don't use the new operator because we explicitly want to have the Injector resolve all of the object's dependencies automatically.
trans-unit.target: 请注意，我们不使用 new 运算符，因为我们明确希望让 Injector 自动解决对象的所有依赖关系。

trans-unit.source: Notification type
trans-unit.target: 通知类型

trans-unit.source: Notifies that an error has been delivered.
trans-unit.target: 通知错误已被送达。

trans-unit.source: Notifies when code enters Angular Zone. This gets fired first on VM Turn.
trans-unit.target: 当代码进入Angular Zone时发出通知。这在VM Turn时首先被触发。

trans-unit.source: Notifies when the last onMicrotaskEmpty has run and there are no more microtasks, which implies we are about to relinquish VM turn. This event gets called just once.
trans-unit.target: 在最后一个 onMicrotaskEmpty 运行并且没有更多微任务时通知，这意味着我们将放弃VM转向。此事件仅被调用一次。

trans-unit.source: Notifies when there is no more microtasks enqueued in the current VM Turn. This is a hint for Angular to do change detection, which may enqueue more microtasks. For this reason this event can fire multiple times per VM Turn.
trans-unit.target: 当当前虚拟机Turn中没有更多的微任务enqueued时通知。这是对Angular进行变更检测的提示,可能会让更多的微任务入库。为此,该事件在每个VM Turn中可以多次触发。

trans-unit.target: Observable

trans-unit.source: Observable HeroService
trans-unit.target: 可观察的 HeroService

trans-unit.source: Observable creation functions
trans-unit.target: 可观察的创建功能

trans-unit.source: Observable data
trans-unit.target: 可观测数据

trans-unit.source: Observable execution errors are delivered to the subscriber's error handler, and the subscriber automatically unsubscribes from the observable.
trans-unit.target: 可观察到的执行错误会被传递给订阅者的错误处理程序,订阅者会自动取消订阅可观察到的内容。

trans-unit.source: Observable subscriptions are cancellable. Unsubscribing removes the listener from receiving further values, and notifies the subscriber function to cancel work.
trans-unit.target: 可观察的订阅是可以取消的。取消订阅会使监听器不再接收更多的值,并通知订阅者函数取消工作。

trans-unit.source: Observables
trans-unit.target: Observables

trans-unit.source: Observables subscribe() is responsible for handling errors. Promises push errors to the child promises. This makes observables useful for centralized and predictable error handling.
trans-unit.target: Observables subscription subscribe() 负责处理错误。诺言将错误推向孩子的诺言。这使得可观察对象对于集中式和可预测的错误处理很有用。

trans-unit.source: Observables and operators
trans-unit.target: 观察者和操作者

trans-unit.source: Observables are declarative—that is, you define a function for publishing values, but it is not executed until a consumer subscribes to it. The subscribed consumer then receives notifications until the function completes, or until they unsubscribe.
trans-unit.target: 可观察变量是声明性的，即，您定义了一个用于发布值的函数，但直到消费者订阅它后，该函数才执行。然后，订阅的使用者会收到通知，直到功能完成或取消订阅为止。

trans-unit.source: Observables are declarative; computation does not start until subscription. Promises execute immediately on creation. This makes observables useful for defining recipes that can be run whenever you need the result.
trans-unit.target: 可观察项是声明性的;在订阅之前,计算不会开始。承诺在创建时立即执行。这使得观测值对于定义配方非常有用,只要你需要结果就可以运行。

trans-unit.source: Observables are not executed until a consumer subscribes. The subscribe() executes the defined behavior once, and it can be called again. Each subscription has its own computation. Resubscription causes recomputation of values.
trans-unit.target: 观察者直到消费者订阅才执行。该 subscribe() 执行一次定义的行为，它可以再次被调用。每个订阅都有自己的计算。重新订阅会导致重新计算值。

trans-unit.source: Observables are often compared to promises. Here are some key differences:
trans-unit.target: 可观察到的东西经常被比作承诺。以下是一些关键的区别:

trans-unit.source: Observables are very similar to event handlers that use the events API. Both techniques define notification handlers, and use them to process multiple values delivered over time. Subscribing to an observable is equivalent to adding an event listener. One significant difference is that you can configure an observable to transform an event before passing the event to the handler.
trans-unit.target: 观测器与使用事件API的事件处理程序非常相似。这两种技术都定义了通知处理程序,并使用它们来处理随时间传递的多个值。订阅一个observable相当于添加一个事件监听器。一个显著的区别是,你可以配置一个observable在将事件传递给处理程序之前对事件进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Observables behave somewhat differently from the alternative techniques in each of these situations, but offer some significant advantages. Here are detailed comparisons of the differences.
trans-unit.target: 在上述每一种情况下,可观测因素的表现与替代技术有些不同,但具有一些显著的优势。以下是对这些差异的详细比较。

trans-unit.source: Observables can deliver single or multiple values of any type to subscribers, either synchronously (as a function delivers a value to its caller) or on a schedule. A subscriber receives notification of new values as they are produced and notification of either normal completion or error completion.
trans-unit.target: 观测器可以向订阅者提供任何类型的单个或多个值,可以是同步的(就像一个函数向其调用者提供一个值一样),也可以是按计划的。订阅者会收到新值产生的通知,以及正常完成或错误完成的通知。

trans-unit.source: Observables can simplify the implementation of type-ahead suggestions. Typically, a type-ahead has to do a series of separate tasks:
trans-unit.target: 观测值可以简化类型前建议的实现。通常情况下,类型先行者必须做一系列独立的任务。

trans-unit.source: Observables compared to arrays
trans-unit.target: 观测值与数组相比

trans-unit.source: Observables compared to events API
trans-unit.target: 与事件API相比,可观察到的事件

trans-unit.source: Observables compared to other techniques
trans-unit.target: 与其他技术相比的可观察性

trans-unit.source: Observables compared to promises
trans-unit.target: 与承诺相比可观察到的情况

trans-unit.source: Observables differentiate between chaining and subscription. Promises only have .then() clauses. This makes observables useful for creating complex transformation recipes to be used by other part of the system, without causing the work to be executed.
trans-unit.target: 观察对象区分链接和订阅。承诺只有 .then() 子句。这使得可观察对象对于创建要由系统其他部分使用的复杂转换配方很有用，而不会导致工作被执行。

trans-unit.source: Observables differentiate between transformation function such as a map and subscription. Only subscription activates the subscriber function to start computing the values.
trans-unit.target: 观察者区分映射和订阅等转换函数。只有订阅才会激活订阅函数,开始计算数值。

trans-unit.source: Observables do not mutate the server response (as can occur through chained .then() calls on promises). Instead, you can use a series of operators to transform values as needed.
trans-unit.target: 可观察变量不会改变服务器响应（可以通过对promise 进行链接的 .then() 调用来实现）。相反，您可以根据需要使用一系列运算符来转换值。

trans-unit.source: Observables in Angular
trans-unit.target: Angular中的可观察项

trans-unit.source: Observables provide many values. Promises provide one. This makes observables useful for getting multiple values over time.
trans-unit.target: 可观察到的东西提供了许多价值。承诺提供一个值。这就使得观测值对于在一段时间内获得多个值非常有用。

trans-unit.source: Observables provide support for passing messages between publishers and subscribers in your application. Observables offer significant benefits over other techniques for event handling, asynchronous programming, and handling multiple values.
trans-unit.target: Observables为您的应用程序中的发布者和订阅者之间传递消息提供了支持。与其他事件处理、异步编程和处理多个值的技术相比,可观察项具有显著的优势。

trans-unit.source: Observations
trans-unit.target: Observations

trans-unit.source: Obtaining a component reference is a bit tricky in Angular. Angular components themselves do not have a tree that you can inspect or navigate programmatically. The parent-child relationship is indirect, established through the components' view objects.
trans-unit.target: 在Angular中获取组件引用有些棘手。角组件本身没有树，您可以通过程序检查或浏览树。父子关系是间接的，通过组件的视图对象建立。

trans-unit.source: Occasionally APIs change formats in a way that is not backward-compatible. A new version of the app may not be compatible with the old API format and thus may not be compatible with existing cached resources from that API.
trans-unit.target: 偶尔 API 会以不向后兼容的方式更改格式。应用程序的新版本可能与旧的 API 格式不兼容,因此可能与该 API 的现有缓存资源不兼容。

trans-unit.source: Occasionally, it may be necessary to examine the Angular service worker in a running state to investigate issues or to ensure that it is operating as designed. Browsers provide built-in tools for debugging service workers and the Angular service worker itself includes useful debugging features.
trans-unit.target: 偶尔,可能需要检查运行状态下的Angular服务工,以调查问题或确保其按照设计运行。浏览器提供了调试服务工的内置工具,Angular服务工本身也包含了有用的调试功能。

trans-unit.source: Once you import a library using the "scripts" array, you should not import it using an import statement in your TypeScript code (such as import * as $ from 'jquery';). If you do, you'll end up with two different copies of the library: one imported as a global library, and one imported as a module. This is especially bad for libraries with plugins, like JQuery, because each copy will have different plugins.
trans-unit.target: 一旦导入使用“脚本”阵列库，你应该不是在你的打字稿代码使用import语句导入（如 import * as $ from 'jquery'; ）。如果这样做，最终将得到该库的两个不同副本：一个作为全局库导入，另一个作为模块导入。这对于带有插件（如JQuery）的库尤其不利，因为每个副本将具有不同的插件。

trans-unit.source: Once you introduce the Angular Router, using the Angular Router triggers navigations through the unified location service, still providing a single source for navigating with AngularJS and Angular.
trans-unit.target: 一旦引入Angular Router,使用Angular Router就会通过统一的位置服务触发导航,仍然为使用AngularJS和Angular导航提供了一个单一的来源。

trans-unit.source: Once you're running a hybrid app, you can start the gradual process of upgrading code. One of the more common patterns for doing that is to use an Angular component in an AngularJS context. This could be a completely new component or one that was previously AngularJS but has been rewritten for Angular.
trans-unit.target: 一旦你运行的是一个混合应用,你就可以开始逐步升级代码的过程。其中一个比较常见的模式是在AngularJS上下文中使用一个Angular组件。这可能是一个全新的组件,也可能是一个之前是AngularJS但已经为Angular重写的组件。

trans-unit.source: One #docregion comment mentions two region names as does an #enddocregion comment. This is a convenient way to start (or stop) multiple regions on the same code line. You could have put these comments on separate lines and many authors prefer to do so.
trans-unit.target: 一个 #docregion 评论提到2个区域名称一样的 #enddocregion 评论。这是在同一代码行上启动（或停止）多个区域的便捷方法。您可以将这些注释放在单独的行中，许多作者更喜欢这样做。

trans-unit.source: One important assertion this disables verifies that a change detection pass does not result in additional changes to any bindings (also known as unidirectional data flow).

trans-unit.source: One of "application" or "library". An application can run independently in a browser, while a library cannot.
trans-unit.target: "应用程序 "或 "库 "之一。应用程序可以在浏览器中独立运行,而库则不能。

trans-unit.source: One of enabled or disabled. When set to enabled, the initial navigation starts before the root component is created. The bootstrap is blocked until the initial navigation is complete. This value is required for server-side rendering to work. When set to disabled, the initial navigation is not performed. The location listener is set up before the root component gets created. Use if there is a reason to have more control over when the router starts its initial navigation due to some complex initialization logic.
trans-unit.target: 其中一个 enabled 或 disabled 。设置为 enabled 时，初始导航在创建根组件之前开始。引导程序将被阻止，直到完成初始导航为止。该值是服务器端渲染正常工作所必需的。设置为 disabled ，不执行初始导航。位置侦听器是在创建根组件之前设置的。如果由于某种复杂的初始化逻辑，有理由对路由器何时开始其初始导航有更多的控制权，请使用。

trans-unit.source: One of the best ways to keep your project bug free is through a test suite, but it's easy to forget to run tests all the time. Continuous integration (CI) servers let you set up your project repository so that your tests run on every commit and pull request.
trans-unit.target: 保持项目无错误的最好方法之一是通过测试套件,但很容易忘记一直运行测试。持续集成(CI)服务器可以让你设置你的项目仓库,使你的测试在每次提交和拉取请求时都能运行。

trans-unit.source: One of the documentation design goals is that guide page code snippets should be examples of real, working code.
trans-unit.target: 文档设计的目标之一是,指导页代码片段应该是真实的、工作的代码的例子。

trans-unit.source: One of the easiest ways to get your site live is to host it using Firebase.
trans-unit.target: 让你的网站上线的最简单的方法之一就是使用Firebase进行托管。

trans-unit.source: One of the keys to a successful upgrade is to do it incrementally, by running the two frameworks side by side in the same application, and porting AngularJS components to Angular one by one. This makes it possible to upgrade even large and complex applications without disrupting other business, because the work can be done collaboratively and spread over a period of time. The upgrade module in Angular has been designed to make incremental upgrading seamless.
trans-unit.target: 成功升级的关键之一是通过在同一应用程序中并排运行两个框架，并将AngularJS组件一个接一个地移植到Angular，来逐步进行升级。这使升级甚至大型和复杂的应用程序成为可能，而不会中断其他业务，因为该工作可以协作完成并分散一段时间。Angular中的 upgrade 模块旨在实现无缝升级。

trans-unit.source: One of the potential side effects of long caching is inadvertently caching an invalid resource. In a normal HTTP cache, a hard refresh or cache expiration limits the negative effects of caching an invalid file. A service worker ignores such constraints and effectively long caches the entire app. Consequently, it is essential that the service worker gets the correct content.
trans-unit.target: 长时间缓存的潜在副作用之一是无意中缓存了一个无效的资源。在正常的HTTP缓存中,硬刷新或缓存到期限制了缓存无效文件的负面影响。服务工作者忽略了这样的限制,并有效地对整个应用程序进行长缓存。因此,服务工作者必须获得正确的内容。

trans-unit.source: Operators are functions that build on the observables foundation to enable sophisticated manipulation of collections. For example, RxJS defines operators such as map(), filter(), concat(), and flatMap().
trans-unit.target: 运算符是在observables基础上构建的功能，用于实现对集合的复杂操作。例如，RxJS定义了诸如 map() ， filter() ， concat() 和 flatMap() 之类的运算符。

trans-unit.source: Operators such as new, typeof, instanceof, etc.
trans-unit.target: 运算符，例如 new ， typeof ， instanceof 等。

trans-unit.source: Operators take configuration options, and they return a function that takes a source observable. When executing this returned function, the operator observes the source observable’s emitted values, transforms them, and returns a new observable of those transformed values. Here is a simple example:

trans-unit.source: Organizing the application features into modules.

trans-unit.source: Organizing your code into distinct functional modules helps in managing development of complex applications, and in designing for reusability. In addition, this technique lets you take advantage of lazy-loading—that is, loading modules on demand—to minimize the amount of code that needs to be loaded at startup.
trans-unit.target: 将代码组织到不同的功能模块中有助于管理复杂应用程序的开发以及可重用性的设计。此外，此技术还可以让您利用延迟加载即按需加载模块）来最大程度地减少启动时需要加载的代码量。

trans-unit.source: Other handlers are less forgiving. For example, the RouterLink directive expects an object with a button property that identifies which mouse button (if any) was pressed during the click. The RouterLink directive throws an error if the event object is missing.
trans-unit.target: 其他处理程序则不太宽容。例如， RouterLink 指令需要一个具有 button 属性的对象，该属性标识单击期间按下了哪个鼠标按钮（如果有）。该 RouterLink 如果事件对象丢失指令引发错误。

trans-unit.target: 在构造参数上使用的参数装饰器,它告诉DI框架从父注入器开始依赖性解析。解析工作通过注入器层次向上进行,所以本地注入器不检查提供者。

trans-unit.source: Phase 1 is code analysis. In this phase, the TypeScript compiler and AOT collector create a representation of the source. The collector does not attempt to interpret the metadata it collects. It represents the metadata as best it can and records errors when it detects a metadata syntax violation.
trans-unit.target: 阶段1是代码分析。在此阶段，TypeScript编译器和AOT收集器创建源的表示形式。收集器不会尝试解释其收集的元数据。它尽可能地表示元数据，并在检测到元数据语法冲突时记录错误。

trans-unit.source: Phase 1: Code analysis
trans-unit.target: 阶段1:代码分析

trans-unit.source: Phase 2 is code generation. In this phase, the compiler's StaticReflector interprets the metadata collected in phase 1, performs additional validation of the metadata, and throws an error if it detects a metadata restriction violation.
trans-unit.target: 第二阶段是代码生成。在此阶段，编译器的 StaticReflector 解释在阶段1中收集的元数据，对元数据进行附加验证，如果它检测到元数据限制冲突，则抛出错误。

trans-unit.source: Phase 2: code generation
trans-unit.target: 阶段2:代码生成

trans-unit.source: Phase 3 is template type checking. In this optional phase, the Angular template compiler uses the TypeScript compiler to validate the binding expressions in templates. You can enable this phase explicitly by setting the fullTemplateTypeCheck configuration option; see Angular compiler options.
trans-unit.target: 第三阶段是模板类型检查。在此可选阶段，Angular 模板编译器使用TypeScript编译器来验证模板中的绑定表达式。您可以通过设置 fullTemplateTypeCheck 配置选项来显式启用此阶段。请参阅Angular编译器选项。

trans-unit.source: Phase 3: Template type checking
